mapper.select: SELECT act_type.* FROM sale_act_type act_type INNER JOIN (select DISTINCT(act.act_type_id) AS act_type_id from sale_act act INNER JOIN `sale_act_price` price on price.`act_id` = act.`id` AND price.`review_status` = 1 and price.`delete_flag` = 0 and price.`forbid_flag` = 0 and now() between price.start_time and price.end_time ) act ON act.act_type_id = act_type.id ORDER BY display_weight DESC, id
SELECT count(DISTINCT act_type.id) FROM sale_act_type act_type INNER JOIN sale_act act ON act.act_type_id = act_type.id
